This game has really boring game play, The story is good and i like the story quite a lot. But i don't get a game for the story solely i get it because it's fun and enjoyable, and this game just doesn't meet those standards due to it having really basic combat along with very okay graphics. This is a game you only get for story, if you are looking for a game with good combat and that is fun to play. This just isn't it.

Cada cierto tiempo vuelvo a jugarlo un gran juego de los que ya no existen.

In 2020+ if you have never played this game, it probably will not blow your mind. You'll probably walk through and say "Yeah, but I've seen this all before".
Well, this game did so many of the things we take for granted [b]first[/b]. With that in mind it can be a real neat trip. Regardless, it's a [i]fun[/i] game.

Half Life 2 is a solid narrative-driven shooter front to back. If you own this already and haven't played it, go for it! If you pick it up in a pack or at a decent price, I feel it's absolutely worth your time.

Criticisms: 

-It seems that there is baked-in autoaim now, on Easy and Normal. Make sure to check your settings and/ or disable it via command line if you hate that kind of thing.

-I can never play it for the first time again.
